def:pageTitle: **Defaults** translations, used when there isn't no local match
iface:infoDetail:
Is possible to change, insert or delete the translations for:
*  Modules (*local* type translations)
*  Default (defaults translations)
*  Common (translations for common modules)
iface:infoHeader: Management of the translations of the forms and calls
logInfoElabLog: List of the key inside the translation file
winedit:info:
Enter the text using the rules of **markdown** ( For more info click Editor sull'help ).  
To enter the parameters to use the braces with the number of the parameter inside  **{ 0 }** ( without spaces between the braces and number )
winedit:title: Translation for {0}
